hr: Okretno magnetsko polje prikazuje se pomoću šupljega bakrenog jajeta, štapičastog magneta i kaveznoga bakrenog rotora koji se okre}u unutar zavojnice sa željeznom jezgrom.
en: The principle of the rotating magnetic field is demonstrated with the help of a hollow copper egg, a bar magnet and copper rotor in the form of a cage that turns within a coil with an iron core.
